projects.name: Gracie's Hanger
projects.caption:
Brand website for small clothes consignment business.

Helped a small business owner build a website that serves as a spot for other small reselling businesses to get advice. Also established a place for all of the owner's socials and online shop links.

projects.name: Distance Field Calculator
projects.caption:
For a Data Structures project in C++, created a distance field calculating program.

Given a black and white image, developed an efficient program designed to calculate the closest distance any given white pixel was to a black pixel. Optimization for this project focused on using a priortiy queue to contain pixels. (Code from class is not to be shared online. Contact me for more information.)

projects.name: Hockey Game Statistic Organizer
projects.caption:
Organized 7500+ rows of hockey game data for a Data Structures project using C++.

Utilizing object oriented programming and information architecture, created an algorithm that sorts a given database of hockey games based on specific commands (i.e. by players, by teams, or by penalties). (Code from class is not to be shared online. Contact me for more information.)

projects.name: Windows Dynamic Wallpaper
projects.caption:
Small personal Python project.

Using Python to access the settings for Windows users, created an application that continuously updates the wallpaper to current data (i.e. the weather, any notes written in given files, and custom emojis). Data for the weather was used from the OpenWeather API. Also utilizes the PIL library for image creation and manipulation for the walpaper.

projects.name: WordGame
projects.caption:
Class project for Minds and Machines and RPI.

In a group with two other students, worked on a Python word game designed to 'think like a human', instead of using pure brute force. Collaborated through GitHub and used a downloaded word database. (Link unavailable as code from class cannot be shared. Contact me for more information.)
